definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: It is made up of spoken Chinese and written Chinese.
sentences.chinese: “语文”是汉语口头语言与书面语言的合称。

sentences.english: Ancients collectively, these three only three.
sentences.chinese: 古人将这三者合称三才。

sentences.english: The Ivy League is a name for 8 schools in the northeastern United States.
sentences.chinese: 美国东北部地区的八所学校合称常春藤联盟。

definition: also known as/alternative name/to also be called
to be called/to be known as
to be collectively called/collective term/general designation
... hence the name (used at the end of a sentence)
to be generally referred to (as)/generic term
Three great poets of the Qianlong and Jiaqing era (1735-1820), namely: Yuan Mei 袁枚, Jiang Shiquan 蔣士銓|蒋士铨 and Zhao Yi 趙翼|赵翼
Four Great Painters of the Six Dynasties, namely: Cao Buxing 曹不興|曹不兴[Cao2 Bu4 xing1], Gu Kaizhi 顧愷之|顾恺之[Gu4 Kai3 zhi1], Lu Tanwei 陸探微|陆探微[Lu4 Tan4 wei1] and Zhang Sengyou 張僧繇|张僧繇[Zhang1 Seng1 you2]
Li Bai 李白[Li3 Bai2] and Du Fu 杜甫[Du4 Fu3]
the four masters of Yuan poetry, namely 虞集[Yu2 Ji2], 範梈|范梈[Fan4 Peng1], 楊載|杨载[Yang2 Zai4] and 揭傒斯[Jie1 Xi1 si1]
